definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.chinese: 取自洋槐等樹木的硬木。

sentences.english: Planting schemes were dominated by indigenous species of evergreens and hardwoods.
sentences.chinese: 種植計劃的主要是常綠樹和硬木原生品種。

sentences.english: Now a new production of large hardwood furniture surface paint or varnish protection.
sentences.chinese: 現在新生產的硬木傢俱表面有大漆或者清漆保護。

sentences.english: For a rich, warm setting, hardwood paneling can't be beat.
sentences.chinese: 對於豐富，溫暖的環境，硬木鑲板是不會被淘汰的。

sentences.english: Both types are solid hardwood which allows the wood to be carved and lathe-turned.
sentences.chinese: 兩種都是實心硬木，可以進行雕刻和車削加工。

sentences.english: Artisans also combine various hardwoods and metal to create distinctive designs.
sentences.chinese: 工匠還各種硬木和金屬結合，創造出獨特的設計。

sentences.english: Blades built up laminated hardwood and pine with ply covering overlain by glued fabric.
sentences.chinese: 刀片建立了覆蓋層的疊層膠織物覆硬木和松樹。

sentences.english: The junior immediately turned his attention to the hardwood.
sentences.chinese: 初中馬上翻臉不認他注意硬木。

sentences.english: The woods match the sheen of an Audi interior.
sentences.chinese: 而且硬木的檔次與奧迪汽車的內飾十分相配。

sentences.english: Laminated hardwoods are the materials behind this creation.
sentences.chinese: 疊片硬木是這個傑作的製作材料。

sentences.english: The monocoque frame is made of hardwood and is exceptionally light weight.
sentences.chinese: 這款車的一體式框架由硬木製成，極其輕便。

sentences.english: Work with the US Department of Agriculture in promulgating rules for governing the Hardwood Checkoff.
sentences.chinese: 與美國農業部的工作，頒佈了硬木覈對的規則。

sentences.english: A well patinated, and large, carved hardwood figure of an elephant made in China, probably for export, during the 19th Century.
sentences.chinese: 極具年代陳積的大款硬木雕象，估爲19世紀外銷品。

sentences.english: If it ever warmed up a little, that's what an alpine mountaintop wants to be also.
sentences.chinese: 如果再暖和一點，高山植物也會變成硬木林的。

sentences.english: Rainforests are cut down by loggers who want to sell valuable hardwoods.
sentences.chinese: 雨林被那些爲了販賣有價值的硬木的伐木者砍倒。

sentences.english: The face veneer may be composed of a hardwood or decorative softwood species.
sentences.chinese: HWPW的面板可以是硬木或者是裝飾軟木材質的。

definition: Phoebe zhennan/Machilus nanmu/Chinese cedar/Chinese giant redwood
pomelo tree (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
